settings.section_paragraph: Created by our founder, an interior designer who couldn't settle for less.

settings.title: The Insider
settings.the_problem_content: "My mat bunches up and catches on the door."
settings.the_solution_content: The Insider’s super sleek, thin profile allows doors to glide over it, while its slip-resistant backing keeps it sticking in place.

settings.title: The Innerweave
settings.the_solution_content: The Innerweave looks just as beautiful as a natural woven mat, but is made from materials that never shed, and are soft underfoot.

settings.title: Our Indoor Collections
settings.subtitle: Mats created to solve the most common issues.

custom_css: .product-card a.text-link {margin: 0 auto; text-decoration: none; background: #725413; color: #fff; padding: 12px 14px;}

settings.custom_html:
<style>
.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main {
   margin-top: 0px !important;
}

.shopify-app-block .stamped-carousel-title {
   display: none;
}

.shopify-app-block .stamped-carousel-stars-wrapper {
   display: none;
}

.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main h2 {
   margin-bottom: 25px;
   font-size: 42px;
   font-style: normal;
   font-weight: 500;
   line-height: 62px;
   letter-spacing: 0.84px;
   color: #546B82;
   font-family: Louize;
}

.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main {
   padding: 56px 40px;
   background: #F4F2EE;
   max-width: unset !important;
}

.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-carousel-subtitle-count {
   font-size: 14px;
   font-weight: 600;
   line-height: 20px;
   letter-spacing: 0.56px;
   color: #333;
   text-transform: lowercase;
   font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif !important;
}

#stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-reviews-date {
   display: none;
}

.stamped-ratings-wrapper .stamped-reviews-rating .stamped-fa {
   color: #D2B066;
}



.rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-scroll #stamped-carousel-scroll-wrapper .stamped-reviews-image {
   display: none !important;
}

.rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-scroll .stamped-reviews-message {
   margin-left: 0px !important;
   white-space: initial !important;
}

.rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-scroll .stamped-reviews-message .stamped-reviews-message-block {
   font-family: brandon !important;
   font-style: normal !important;
   font-size: 14px !important;
   color: #30383D !important;
   font-weight: 400 !important;
   line-height: 20px !important;
}

.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-carousel-scroll:before {
   border-bottom: 2px solid #CAD2D3 !important;
}

.stamped-carousel-scroll .stamped-reviews-author {
   margin-left: 8px !important;
   position: relative;
   font-size: 16px;
   font-style: normal;
   font-weight: 420;
   line-height: 24px;
   font-family: brandon;
   color: #30383D;
}

.stamped-carousel-scroll .stamped-reviews-author:before {
   content: "";
   background: #30383D;
   position: absolute;
   width: 5px;
   height: 2px;
   left: -8px;
   bottom: 11px;
}

.rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-buttons {
   width: 100%;
}

.rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-button-left {
   position: absolute;
   left: 0px;
   top: 50%;
   transform: translateY(-50%);
   z-index: 5;
}

.rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-button-right {
   position: absolute;
   right: 0px;
   top: 50%;
   transform: translateY(-50%);
   z-index: 5;
}

.rave-reviews .stamped-reviews-title a {
   font-size: 24px;
   font-style: normal;
   font-weight: 500;
   line-height: 28px;
   /* 116.667% */
   letter-spacing: 0.48px;
   font-family: louize;
   color: #30383D;

}

.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-ratings-wrapper:nth-child(1) {
   padding-left: 50px;
}

#stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-subtitle {
   margin: 0 40px 12px 0;
   color: #333;
   font-size: 14px;
   font-weight: 600;
   line-height: 20px;
   letter-spacing: 0.56px;
   text-transform: lowercase;
   font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif !important;
}

.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-ratings-wrapper {
   padding: 0 20px 0 30px !important;
}

#stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-scroll {
   width: calc(100% + 50px) !important;
   margin: 0 -20px 0 -30px;
}

.rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-carousel-scroll:before {
   width: calc(100% - 120px);
   margin: 0 60px;
}

#stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-button-left:before {
   content: "" !important;
   background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0084/8602/7327/files/Frame_78.svg?v=1694764036');
   width: 20px;
   height: 20px;
   background-size: 20px;
   position: absolute;
   background-position: center;
}

#stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-button-right:before {
   content: "" !important;
   background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0084/8602/7327/files/Frame_80.svg?v=1694764035');
   width: 20px;
   height: 20px;
   background-size: 20px;
   position: absolute;
   background-position: center;
}

@media (max-width:768px) {
   .rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main h2 {
      font-size: 32px;
      line-height: 40px;
   }

   .rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main h2 {
      margin-bottom: 20px;
   }

   .rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main {
      padding: 40px 20px;
   }
}

@media (max-width:690px) {
   .rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main {
      padding: 32px 15px;
   }

   #stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-subtitle {
      margin-right: 0;
      float: left;
   }

   #stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] {
      width: 100%;
   }

   .rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-ratings-wrapper {
      padding: 0 !important
   }

   #stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-scroll .stamped-reviews-message,
   #stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-scroll .stamped-reviews-author {
      margin-left: 0px !important;
   }

   .rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-buttons {
      width: 100%;
   }

   .rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-button-left {
      position: unset;
      left: 0px;
      top: 50%;
      transform: unset;
      z-index: 999;
   }

   .rave-reviews .stamped-carousel-button-right {
      position: unset;
      right: 0px;
      top: 50%;
      transform: unset;
      z-index: 999;
   }

   .rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-carousel-scroll:before {
      width: calc(100% - 30px);
      margin: 0 15px;
   }

   .rave-reviews .rave-reviews-main .stamped-carousel-subtitle-count {
      font-size: 13px;
   }

   #stamped-reviews-widget[data-widget-type=carousel] .stamped-carousel-scroll {
      margin: -12px -20px 0 -30px;
   }

}

/* faq section */
.faq__question p {
    font-weight: 400;
}
.faq__content p {
    margin-bottom: 12px;
}
</style>

settings.answer:
P+H wants our customers to be completely happy with their purchase. We will accept returns within thirty (30) days of order placement for a full refund. Goods must be returned unused in original packaging. Return shipping charges will be deducted from the original form of payment.

If you need to return an item, please click here. A return label will be provided to you. If you experience any issues getting a return label please email us at support@porteandhall.com

Please visit our returns portal. Enter your order number and the email address used to place the order. A return label will be generated and further instructions will be provided. If you experience any issues with our returns portal please reach out to support@porteandhall.com.
Yes we do! Check out our virtual gift cards here.

settings.title_richtext: Is The Insider safe on hardwood floors, radient heated floors and luxury vinyl plank flooring?
settings.answer: Yes, the Insider is safe to use on all floor types. The Insider has been tested on heated floors and can withstand heat up to 97 degrees fahrenheit. It is also safe on LVP floors. It will not transfer or leave residue.
Yes, the Innerweave is indoor/outdoor and we recommend for outdoor covered areas.

settings.title_richtext: How thick is The Innerweave and The Insider? What clearance do I need for them to fit under the door?
settings.answer:
With an incredibly minimal pile height, The Insider line can fit under most doors easily. But it never hurts to check! The height (or thickness) is 1/8''. We recommend a door clearance of 1/4”.

For The Innerweave line, the height (or thickness) is 3/8''. We recommend a door clearance of 1/2”.
Our preferred method is to shake out the mat. If vacuuming, be sure to adjust settings so the rotating brushes are on higher setting to prevent fiber damage or fraying from the beater bar.

Our preferred method: apply cold water (using the most forceful water pressure as possible) to remove stains. Hang to dry. Do not machine wash.

For tougher stains, we have found that OxiClean™ works best. Rub a small amount of OxiClean™ on the stain with a damp microfiber and allow it to absorb for 5-10 minutes. Hose down and hang to dry.

settings.heading: Meet Stafford, founder of Porte + Hall
settings.text: “In my 20 years as an interior designer, I struggled to source entry mats that were as well-designed and functional as the rest of the home. I was bewildered by the scarcity of options. Why was the first thing to greet you at your door not important? So I decided to design my own - because first impressions matter, for you and your guests.  Welcome to our collection and we hope you walk all over us!”
